abstract: North Korea's Central News Agency reports that Canadian missionary Rev Lim Hyeon-soo has confessed to attempting to overthrow country's government; does not mention any formal charges being brought against Lim.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Lim Hyeon-soo said at a news conference in Pyongyang that he had conducted “anti-D.P.R.K. missionary activities,” according to a state-run news agency.

headline.main: North Korea Says Detained Canadian Pastor Confessed to Crimes
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Pastor Is Said to Confess

snippet: The Rev. Lim Hyeon-soo said at a news conference in Pyongyang that he had conducted “anti-D.P.R.K. missionary activities,” according to a state-run news agency.
